channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 研究人员说，鸟类、甲虫和小虫等天敌可能是杀虫剂的有效替代品，它们可以减少破坏作物的害虫数量，同时提高作物产量。
item.description:
Natural predators like birds, beetles and bugs might be an effective alternative to pesticides, keeping crop-devouring pests populations down while boosting crop yields, researchers said https://t.co/yJOsyvPiTk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #秘鲁总理因涉嫌利用影响力兜售商品而辞职
item.description:
#BREAKING Peru prime minister resigns amid influence peddling claims pic.twitter.com/2tujH8pph6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 周二，海地首都警察学院遭到一个武装团伙的袭击，这个加勒比海小国在机场遇袭和致命的越狱事件后陷入了更深的国际孤立之中
item.description:
The police academy in Haiti's capital came under attack by an armed gang Tuesday as the tiny Caribbean nation fell into deeper international isolation in the wake of an assault on the airport and a deadly prison breakout https://t.co/8q1soV78CI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉政府希望利用地热毯恢复冰川昔日的辉煌。
item.description:
A small patch of ice among bare rock is all that remains of Venezuela’s last glacier, which the government hopes to restore to its former glory using a geothermal blanket.

Experts say that would be too little too late https://t.co/stGsDoQokC

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 达特茅斯学院男子篮球运动员周二以 13 比 2 的投票结果决定加入工会，这一史无前例的举动可能预示着价值数十亿美元的美国大学体育界将发生重大变革。
item.description:
Men's basketball players at Dartmouth College voted 13-2 to join a union Tuesday, an unprecedented move that could signal major changes in the multi-billion-dollar world of American college sports https://t.co/o7dp9xL4hN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 从关于原子弹和奥斯威辛集中营的剧情片，到关于玩偶和性变态复活尸体的喜剧片，周日的 #Oscars 最佳影片角逐阵容是历年来最丰富的一次。
item.description:
From dramas about the atomic bomb and Auschwitz, to comedies about dolls and sex-mad reanimated corpses, the lineup of best picture contenders at Sunday's #Oscars is the most varied in years https://t.co/ynaNFzcYEX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 本周二在日内瓦成立的一家新研究所的创始人表示，科学家们将致力于将量子计算机的巨大新兴力量用于公益事业。
item.description:
Scientists will work to channel the huge emerging power of quantum computers for the common good at a new institute that opened in Geneva on Tuesday, its founders said https://t.co/bGdsy7tTXm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙周二敦促乌克兰的盟国不要做支持乌克兰抵抗俄罗斯入侵的 "懦夫"。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday urged Ukraine's allies not to be "cowards" in supporting the country to fight off the Russian invasion https://t.co/0GdWCKiwuI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #委内瑞拉官方将于 7 月 28 日举行总统选举
item.description:
#BREAKING Venezuela will hold presidential elections on July 28: official pic.twitter.com/U14grH0IOy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: #以色列表示将与往年一样允许朝拜者在斋月期间进入阿克萨清真寺
item.description:
#BREAKING Israel says to allow worshippers access to Al-Aqsa in Ramadan as in 'previous years' pic.twitter.com/LeZAhe7NXB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 哈马斯称谈判之路 "不会无限期开放 "#BREAKING Hamas says path of negotiations 'will not be open indefinitely'.
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas says path of negotiations 'will not be open indefinitely' pic.twitter.com/4ZKrgHVOdg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 二战结束 80 年后，荷兰准备开放第一座大屠杀博物馆，希望在加沙战争导致反犹主义抬头之际提高人们的意识。
item.description:
Eighty years after World War II, the Netherlands is poised to open its first Holocaust museum, hoping to raise awareness at a time when the Gaza war has driven up anti-Semitism.https://t.co/Cj0eU9PBhL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: ⚠️ 在非洲和亚洲，拥有白皙的皮肤往往与较高的地位、特权和美丽联系在一起。为了减少皮肤中的黑色素，许多人求助于不规范的面霜和美白针。但是，这些都可能是危险的，@WHO 警告说，它们会对人体造成危害。
item.description:
⚠️ In Africa and Asia, having fair skin is often associated with higher status, privilege and beauty.

In their quest to reduce the melanin in their skin, many turn to unregulated creams and skin-whitening jabs. But these can be dangerous, with the @WHO warning they pose a… pic.twitter.com/u9m3o5bMqK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：由于怀疑之前的选举（包括 2020 年的投票）被盗，沙斯塔县监事会决定终止租用 Dominion 投票机的合同，该投票机用于处理该县的选票。
item.description:
VIDEO: Based on suspicions that previous elections were stolen, including the 2020 vote, the Shasta County's Board of Supervisors has decided to end a contract for their lease of Dominion voting machines, used to process votes in the county. pic.twitter.com/3yezf5yFcF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：周二下午早些时候，河内在空气监测网站 IQAir 不断更新的全球污染最严重城市排行榜上名列榜首，越南首都笼罩在一片浓重的污染雾霾之中。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hanoi topped air monitoring website IQAir's continually updated table of the world's most polluted cities early on Tuesday afternoon, with the Vietnamese capital blanketed by a thick haze of pollution. pic.twitter.com/Fbs7cWpBAT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：海地首都基本关闭，居民只能外出购买生活必需品，因为当局在一所监狱遭到袭击后实施了紧急状态，释放了数千名囚犯。
item.description:
VIDEO: Haiti's capital is largely shut down, with residents only venturing out for essentials, as authorities impose a state of emergency after an attack on a prison which freed thousands of inmates. pic.twitter.com/r5WFp9161g

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：孟加拉国诺贝尔和平奖获得者穆罕默德-尤努斯（Muhammad Yunus）说，在他的国家，反对政府的人的言论自由权 "有点消失 "了。
item.description:
VIDEO: Bangladeshi Nobel peace laureate Muhammad Yunus says the right to free expression has 'kind of disappeared' for government opponents in his country. pic.twitter.com/nQQFSmZ8kD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周二敦促乌克兰的盟国不要做支持该国抵抗俄罗斯入侵的 "懦夫"。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday urged Ukraine's allies not to be "cowards" in supporting the country to fight off the Russian invasion.https://t.co/t9XEAxLAd8 pic.twitter.com/DaeqKa37UP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：在偏远的苏格兰小镇坎贝尔敦，一家纯素食巧克力制作公司正在为奥斯卡颁奖礼的礼品袋提供巧克力。
item.description:
VIDEO: In the remote Scottish town of Campbeltown, a one-woman vegan chocolate-making company is providing chocolates for the Oscars goodie bags. pic.twitter.com/hk6qqiQhPR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 本周二，在巴黎时装周的最后一天，香奈儿来到海边，为其著名创始人开设第一家精品店的地方举办了一场时装秀。
item.description:
On the last day of #ParisFashionWeek on Tuesday, Chanel took a trip to the seaside for a show dedicated to the place where its famous founder launched her first boutique.https://t.co/9udu9nslyH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：3月3日，一架10年前神秘失踪的马来西亚航空公司客机上的乘客亲属聚集在吉隆坡附近，举行悼念活动，并呼吁进行新的搜寻。
item.description:
VIDEO: Relatives of passengers on a Malaysia Airlines plane that mysteriously vanished 10 years ago gathered near Kuala Lumpur on March 3, for a memorial as they called for a new search. pic.twitter.com/FobtvNhl6a

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 军方周二表示，威尔士王妃凯瑟琳将于 6 月出席其岳父查尔斯三世国王的生日庆典，这是她接受手术后宣布的第一项正式任务。
item.description:
Catherine, Princess of Wales, is set to attend her father-in-law King Charles III's birthday celebrations in June, the army said on Tuesday, her first official duty to be announced since undergoing surgery.https://t.co/kzMrFsS2uf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：一个致力于寻找智利 1973-1990 年独裁统治期间被非法收养和带到国外的儿童的非政府组织将利用人工智能寻找这些儿童。
item.description:
VIDEO: An NGO dedicated to finding children illegally adopted and taken abroad during Chile's 1973-1990 dictatorship will search for them using artificial intelligence. pic.twitter.com/C4yOjuivUO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 欧盟官员公布了一项雄心勃勃的建议，将大规模提高欧盟的武器生产和采购，以摆脱对美国武器的依赖，并对俄罗斯入侵乌克兰做出反应。
item.description:
EU officials have unveiled an ambitious proposal to massively boost weapons production and procurement in the bloc to shift from a reliance on US arms and in reaction to Russia's invasion of Ukraine.https://t.co/YmjP1aY85n

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：法国议会投票决定将堕胎权写入宪法，使法国成为世界上第一个在基本法中明确保护终止妊娠的国家#AFPVertical🎥 @anahidyan, Nassim Chakib GOMRI, ASSEMBLEE NAT.
item.description:
VIDEO: The French parliament has voted to anchor the right to abortion in the constitution, making France the first country in the world to offer explicit protection for terminating a pregnancy in its basic law#AFPVertical
🎥 @anahidyan, Nassim Chakib GOMRI, ASSEMBLEE NAT. pic.twitter.com/HYoRH49lCl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰称，自莫斯科 2022 年 2 月入侵黑海以来，乌克兰军队已摧毁了二十多艘俄罗斯船只，包括最近几周的几艘。
item.description:
The Black Sea has been a vital battleground with Ukraine saying their forces have destroyed more than two dozen Russian ships since Moscow invaded in February 2022, including several in recent weeks.https://t.co/0WOltNt8dI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频："地下音乐 "在英国首都有了全新的含义，因为自科维德大流行以来，地铁交通系统首次举行了巴士艺人选拔赛#AFPVertical🎥 @akshatakapoor12
item.description:
VIDEO: “Underground music” is taking on a whole new meaning in the British capital as the Tube transport system holds busker auditions for the first time since the Covid pandemic.#AFPVertical
🎥 @akshatakapoor12 pic.twitter.com/kPKTYNafsG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：伊拉克远离大城市的喧嚣，伊拉克年轻人在经历多年冲突后，越来越多地利用重新获得的安全感，探索该国宁静的沙漠度假胜地。
item.description:
VIDEO: Far from the hustle and bustle of major cities, young Iraqis are increasingly taking advantage of a renewed sense of safety to explore the country's serene desert getaways after years of conflict. pic.twitter.com/ozrBi4Qgq9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 周二，国际调停人与哈马斯谈判代表在开罗举行会谈，商讨在下周初穆斯林斋月开始前暂停加沙近五个月的战事➡️。
item.description:
International mediators were with Hamas negotiators in Cairo on Tuesday for talks on a truce to pause nearly five months of fighting in Gaza before the Muslim holy month of Ramadan, which begins early next week ➡️ https://t.co/g8ijB99luf pic.twitter.com/fzxEXFsTnQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇧🇩 诺贝尔奖获得者尤努斯称孟加拉国的权利 "有点消失 "了和平奖得主穆罕默德-尤努斯（Muhammad Yunus）凭借其小额信贷银行帮助数百万人摆脱了贫困，他说许多人认为总理谢赫-哈西娜（Sheikh Hasina）将他视为政治威胁。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇧🇩 Nobel winner Yunus says rights have 'kind of disappeared' in Bangladesh

Peace laureate Muhammad Yunus, credited with lifting millions out of poverty with his microfinance bank, says many believe prime minister Sheikh Hasina views him as a political threat pic.twitter.com/rHbALqSh8e

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 5, 2024
